title: NM Special Report: Kyiv Flâneur (Mar 12) w/ Vova Vorotniov
itunes:author: New Models
itunes:summary:
As Ukrainian forces enter a third week of fighting off Russia’s full-force invasion, artist VOVA VOROTNIOV reports from Kyiv, sharing details from life in the city during wartime, a primer on corruption (both bad and "good"), and what terms he sees for possible resolution (spoiler: Russia go home).

Image: Vova Vorotniov, Kyiv, 8 May 2022

For more:
IG: https://www.instagram.com/vovavorotniov/
Telegram: https://t.me/proof_of_war

Berlin-Ukraine aid on Telegram: https://t.me/ukraineberlinarrivalsupport 
Berlin-Ukraine housing: https://www.unterkunft-ukraine.de/
Outro audio via https://soundcloud.com/will-ponomarenko
